guide.title: Gentoo metastructure project
guide.abstract: The metastructure toplevel project is concerned with the management structure of gentoo.

body.p: The metastructure project is concerned with the management structure of the gentoo project. It's current goal is to make sure all proposals to that extend are remembered.
Currently the procedure for making sure that a proposal gets noticed is just mail it to me.

tr.ti: This subproject keeps a listing of all toplevel projects and their major subprojects
The herds project. This project aims to create infrastructure for grouping ebuilds, and assigning maintainers
